meta_description.title: How to Run Your Python Scripts? - KnowledgeHut

snippet.heading: Using python commandThe most basic and the easy way to run Python scripts is by using the python command. You need to open a command-line and type the word python followed by the path to your script file, like this:python first_script.py Hello World! Then you hit the ENTER button from the keyboard and that's it.

people_also_ask.heading: Using the python Command To run Python scripts with the python command, you need to open a command-line and type in the word python , or python3 if you have both versions, followed by the path to your script, just like this: $ python3 hello.py Hello World!

people_also_ask.heading: Using python commandThe most basic and the easy way to run Python scripts is by using the python command. You need to open a command-line and type the word python followed by the path to your script file, like this:python first_script.py Hello World! Then you hit the ENTER button from the keyboard and that's it.

people_also_ask.heading: A widely used way to run Python code is through an interactive session. To start a Python interactive session, just open a command-line or terminal and then type in python , or python3 depending on your Python installation, and then hit Enter .
